name: BoneScan
title: Bone Scan
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent bone scan diagnostic imaging.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with conventional technetium-99m-MDP bone scan as well as 18F-NaF PET (or PET/CT) scan.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
